name: Sam Wood/Amnesty International pack.
description:
October is almost upon us, as is Human Rights Week from the 11th to the 17th.

To support this cause we've got a few packs to give away to you guys.

These packs will include:
1 "Protect The Human" pin.*
2 Amnesty International balloons.*
2 "Protect The Human" Stickers
"Hey Little Bird" EP (by Sam Wood)

All of that just for Â£4.00!

** These come in three different colours, Green, pink or yellow. (Stickers come in Yellow or Pink).

Please help us out as it goes to helping people who havent got the rights like we do because of government rule or religous barriers.

EVERYONE DESERVES A FAIR RIGHT TO LIFE.
